content: asymmetrical triangle shawl knit with one skein of fingering weight yarn this easy pattern is a mixture of relaxing garter stich and simple eyelets yarn 1 skein yarn twisters sw sock yarn 380m 415 yards /100 g 75% superwash merino 25% nylon sample knit in colourway make it blue make it pink gauge 20 sts by 48 row equal 4 by 4 in garter before blocking needles 3 75mm us 5 32 circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge notions darning needle finished size centre depth 14 35 5 cm wingspan 55 140 cm
